title: Bakewell flapjack
ingredients: ['100g ordinary oats', '30g plain flour', '50g ground almonds', 'pinch of salt', '85g unsalted butter, melted', '1 teaspoon almond extract or essence', '1 tablespoon golden syrup', '1 tablespoon jam of your choice (raspberry, plum)', 'flaked almonds', 'white chocolate (optional)']
